Text: Is it just me or is this seriously out of sync?
This is way out of sync. Over a second. Painful.

Apologies for replying to myself but:

If you use Media Player classic and tell the audio switcher to timeshift the audio by 3000ms it syncs up perfectly...
Oh, and you may want to make it 6000ms about 2/3rds of the way through.
Def. out of sync...waiting for alt. release.

Schysst att du lägger upp! 
tack så hemskt mycket!
Vi e nog rätt många som ser fram emot dom här avsnitten varje vecka.

Dålig synk på denna dock

/

If you are out of sync (thanks to thebudgie for this):

Download Media Player classic and tell the audio switcher to timeshift the audio by 3000ms it syncs up perfectly... after about 2/3's change it to 6000ms.
